item.title: DeChambeau's trainer aware of rush to judgment
item.description: Greg Roskopf, the trainer for Bryson DeChambeau, understands why there might be conjecture after the PGA Tour golfer gained 50 pounds -- and 20 yards off the tee -- in less than a year.

item.title: Lakers re-creating home feel in Orlando bubble
item.description: The Lakers are re-creating the sights and sounds of home by having their own P.A. announcer record introductions.

item.title: Scherzer leaves start vs. Mets after first inning
item.description: Max Scherzer left his start against the Mets after just one inning Wednesday night. Washington did not immediately announce why Scherzer was taken out after merely 27 pitches.

item.title: Tiger looking to a putter switch before Round 1
item.description: On the eve of the PGA Championship, Tiger Woods appears set to make a rare putter switch at TPC Harding Park.

item.title: Bills' Diggs denies he forced way out of Minny
item.description: New Bills wide receiver Stefon Diggs denies that he forced his way out of Minnesota.

item.title: Report: TTU coach created 'toxic environment'
item.description: In addition to allegations of mental abuse by Texas Tech women's basketball coach Marlene Stollings, a USA Today Sports report cited multiple allegations of sexual harassment against a strength and conditioning coach who resigned in March.

item.title: Follow live: Union, Timbers clash for spot in MLS is Back final
item.description: null

item.title: Barnwell: Projecting future Hall of Famers for all 32 NFL teams
item.description: Is J.J. Watt a future Hall of Famer? How about Patrick Mahomes? Julian Edelman, Earl Thomas and Richard Sherman? Which current players have the best cases?

item.title: PGA Championship's biggest questions (and answers): From Tiger to Brooks to Sunday drama
item.description: The year's first major comes with plenty of questions, and not only because it's the first one in 13 months and the first one without fans. We go through each and give some answers.

item.title: PGA Championship: ESPN predictions on who'll win golf's first major of the year
item.description: A variety of players have looked strong since golf came back, so our experts had a lot of options.

item.title: Best of Wednesday at NFL training camps: Washington's new look, who's missing and who's back
item.description: Washington showed off numbers on its new helmets, and Jarvis Landry got really excited about the Browns' new duds. Check out the top photos, videos, quotes and notes from the NFL on Wednesday.

item.title: Will there be fans at games? Where all 32 teams stand for the regular season
item.description: From limited capacity to no fans at all, teams reveal to our reporters their current plans for attendance at games.

item.title: What the NBA is buzzing about for all 22 teams inside the bubble
item.description: Here is our roundup of what we've seen and heard from each of the 22 teams in the NBA restart.

item.title: What are coaches and players willing to sacrifice for a college football season?
item.description: Coaches at Penn State and Wake Forest are self-isolating from at-risk family members because of the risk of catching coronavirus, while players and coaches with underlying health issues must put faith in a system that will keep them safe on campus.

item.title: NHL Playoffs Daily: Rangers out, Islanders one win away from moving on
item.description: Six more games coming in hot! Plus a look back at Tuesday's elimination, fake punch and standout performers.

item.title: Another penalty? Why NHL officials have been whistle-happy during the postseason
item.description: Teams are averaging more than 12 penalty minutes per game, up from recent postseasons.

item.title: Jorge Masvidal set for televised cornhole challenge against top pro
item.description: UFC star Jorge Masvidal will face American Cornhole League champ Cody Henderson in a match on Wednesday night.

item.title: Lapchick: More college conferences should follow WCC's lead on race, gender efforts
item.description: The West Coast Conference's move to adopt a new "Russell Rule" and conduct racial and gender report cards is a positive move that should inspire more leagues to follow suit.

item.title: UConn first FBS team to cancel football season
item.description: UConn announced Wednesday that it is suspending its football program for the 2020 season because of the coronavirus pandemic.

item.title: NBA extends spotless coronavirus testing streak
item.description: The NBA again says it has had no positive COVID-19 test results from any of the 343 players on its Orlando campus.

item.title: Manfred: MLB protocols working despite setbacks
item.description: Rob Manfred thinks that the health protocols in place are keeping baseball going.

item.title: Will Messi, Ronaldo meet in Champions League final again? Don't count these legends out
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi have dominated the Champions League in their careers. Let's hope we get one last head-to-head in the tournament.

item.title: Debate: Could wins for Derrick Lewis and Chris Weidman lead to title runs?
item.description: ESPN's expert panel takes a closer look at the top of Saturday's UFC Fight Night card, which features veterans Derrick Lewis and Chris Weidman.

item.title: Three fighters earn contracts in season debut of Contender Series
item.description: Uros Medic, Jordan Leavitt and Dustin Jacoby each were invited to the UFC by Dana White after earning impressive victories on Tuesday.

item.title: Experts debate: What now for Terence Crawford? Is Luke Campbell too big a step for Ryan Garcia?
item.description: Our boxing experts debate Terence Crawford's next opponent, glove size for Mike Tyson-Roy Jones Jr., Ryan Garcia's chances against Luke Campbell and more.

item.title: NBA draft rankings: New top 100 prospects and scouting reports
item.description: Our experts update their rankings of the 100 best prospects for the 2020 draft.

item.title: In an MLB season short of celebrations, Jon Jay achieves a veteran's milestone
item.description: Reaching 10 years in the majors usually means a big celebration with teammates. Not this year.

item.title: Murray Walker: Hamilton better than Schumacher, Senna
item.description: Formula One commentary legend Murray Walker believes Lewis Hamilton is better than Ayrton Senna and Michael Schumacher because he does not share their "highly debatable driving tactics".

item.title: Renault, Racing Point set for hearing over 'pink Mercedes' protest
item.description: The hearing over Renault's protest will take place Wednesday.

item.title: Who are the Overwatch League coaches' top teams after Week 26?
item.description: We polled coaches from around the Overwatch League to get their takes on who's the best going into the Countdown Cup.
